question: Who clinched the Formula One German Grand Prix 2019?
explanation: Red Bull\'s driver Max Verstappen clinched the rain-hit German Grand Prix 2019 at Hockenheim.  He secured his 2nd win of the season and 7th of his career. He held himself calm and composed in a race littered with crashes and safety cars. Four-time former champion Ferrari driver Sebastian Vettel claimed the 2nd spot after starting from the rear of the grind. Russian Daniil Kvyat achieved the third spot for Toro Rosso followed by Canadian Lance Stroll in fourth for Racing Point.
